tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ab_tests (
  test_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  test_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  content_element TEXT,
  variant_a TEXT,
  variant_b TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE A/B_test_sessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    test_id INT REFERENCES A/B_test_results(test_id),
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    session_start TIMESTAMP,
    session_end TIMESTAMP,
    conversion_event BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE ab_tests (
    test_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    test_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE test_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    test_id INT,
    variation_id INT,
    conversion_rate DECIMAL(5, 2),
    confidence_level DECIMAL(5, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE ContentElements (
  content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  element_name VARCHAR(255),
  element_type VARCHAR(50),
  element_value TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ABTests (
  test_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  test_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE TestResults (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  test_id INT,
  content_id INT,
  conversion_rate FLOAT,
  engagement_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE TestParticipants (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  test_id INT,
  content_id INT,
  group_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE A/B_Tests (
  test_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  test_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Test_Variants (
  variant_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  test_id INT REFERENCES A/B_Tests(test_id),
  variant_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Test_Results (
  result_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  test_id INT REFERENCES A/B_Tests(test_id),
  variant_id INT REFERENCES Test_Variants(variant_id),
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  conversion BOOLEAN NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Content_Elements (
  element_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  element_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  element_type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Test_Element_Map (
  map_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  test_id INT REFERENCES A/B_Tests(test_id),
  element_id INT REFERENCES Content_Elements(element_id)
)
